changelog.en:
# New Features / Enhancements

## New WebUI & Dashboard

- Completely new WebUI with a new, informative dashboard
- Dark mode support

## Maintenance Mode

- Individual data devices can be set to maintenance mode
- Devices in maintenance mode are not considered for charge control or alarm rules
- Optionally, MQTT data from these devices can still be sent

## Temperature & Charging Control

- Temperature Profile: Configure an exact temperature profile for the cells’ charge current (C-rate)
- Voltage regulation for current zero control to limit the charging current
- Charging voltage ramp: slow, controlled adjustment of the charging voltage

## Automation & Safety

- Trigger Scheduler: execute triggers on a schedule
- Comparison of cell/total voltage between data devices
- Extended plausibility check: battery current comparison
- Missing inverter heartbeat is displayed under Active Errors

## Network

- New WiFi Manager
  - Auto-reconnect after 5 minutes if it switches to AP mode

## MQTT / API

- MQTT send interval configurable from 1 second  
  Note: For intervals below 30 s, adherence to the interval cannot be guaranteed.
- REST API extended

## Devices / Protocols / Hardware

- Support for LILYGO T-CONNECT as an alternative to the original BSC hardware
- New/extended BMS support:
  - Daren BMS
  - Pylontech
- PACE PC200: RS232 support added

# Fixed / Improved

- Fixed an error in the min/max temperature calculation
- Settings import: fixed an issue when special characters were included
- Fixed incorrect current values sent to the inverter for currents > 327 A
- Fixed SmartShunt timeouts
- Fix: value adjustment for SoC 0
- Fix: MQTT was no longer sent after a long runtime
- Fix: corrected negative temperature values for JK BMS
- DALY SoC High/Low is no longer reported as an alarm

# Important! Please Review!

After the update, please review (and correct if necessary) the following settings:

- Inverter → General → Battery pack settings → Capacity
- Relay outputs → Invert
- Data device mapping → Interface
- Data device mapping → Address

⚠️ Important: For this release, the display must be updated to version ≥ 1.0.5 — otherwise readings/values shown will be incorrect.

# Firmware Mapping

- Original BSC hardware: `firmware_xx_xx.bin`
- Lilygo T-CONNECT – Flashing via USB: `firmware_tconnect_full_xx_xx.bin`
- Lilygo T-CONNECT – Update via OTA: `firmware_tconnect_ota_xx_xx.bin`
